entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
